message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your operations or personal needs. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be significantly higher than $8000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $12000. This opportunity is tailored specifically for you and may not be available to others. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.
